profileAlternative.name: Caroline (Roberts) Kurth
profileAlternative.headline: Accounting Operations Manager at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
Experienced Accounting Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in the Order-to-Cash Cycle, SalesForce.com, NetSuite, Process Enhancements and Documentation, Accounts Receivable, Accounting Operations, Analytical Skills, Travel and Expenses (Concur/Expensify), Leadership, and Microsoft Excel.

Strong accounting professional with a Bachelor of Science focused in Accounting from University of Central Florida - College of Business Administration.

positions.title:
Title
Finance, Order to Cash Specialist
Analyst, Accountant II
positions.description:
We provide access to primary research for a wide range of companies: financial and investment institutions, life science companies, the Fortune 1000 and entrepreneurs around the globe. We can connect you with essential and timely expertise that can lead to understanding the industries, markets and issues integral to shaping your business's success. Our extensive and rigorous compliance framework enables our clients' best practices while connecting them to the most relevant insights.


Prepared and analyzed accounts receivable aging schedules, account reconciliations, revenue recognition statements, and dispute reports for month-end close processes.

Created and tied down client accounts and usage reports.

Recorded adjusting entries regarding revenue for month-end close.

Daily activities included: Collections for Ireland clients, recording non-cash journal entries, and coding specific revenue by product type and location.

educations.title: University of Central Florida - College of Business Administration

given.text: Caroline is a hardworking classmate who brings great insight and energy into the classroom. She is also a very responsible and diligent group member.

received.text: Kevin is a responsible and hardworking student. He performs well in a group by getting all of his work done ahead of time and the right way. Kevin is always willing to go out of his way to help other classmates. He is a strong leader, with noteworthy communication and writing skills. I would highly recommend Kevin for any job he is trying to pursue.
